overview.en: Using block chain technology to solve the problem of data island in advertising industry, create a mobile advertising block chain with decentralized, transparent data and real-time value transmission, realizing the redistribution of benefits.
overview.zh: 利用区块链技术，解决广告行业数据孤岛，共创一个去中心化，数据透明，价值实时传递的移动广告区块链，实现利益的重新分配。
